Text:
THANK YOU! I've been looking for this since I "lost" my copy several years ago.

BTW, this is now the 'soundtrack' to a science fiction novel written by Kantner.
Um, any chance you could rerecord this? It has skips in it (listen at 2:27 to 2:30 in the first cut). If so, a higher bit rate would be appreciated.
please put sunfighter on will seed for 30 days
yeah, holy crap, all i've ever had is my cassette tape.  never ever seen a cd before or a torrent.  thanks a million.
